===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A blackish-brown coarse powder used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to dispel ''wind-cold'', promote blood circulation and relieve pain in the treatment of rheumatic or rheumatoid arthralgia with numbness of the limbs, and epigastric pain".
